name: The Firework Alchemist
description:
In The Firework Alchemist, the player embodies a pyrotechnic artist:
at his disposal, pigments, artifacts and glitter, which will allow him to create a firework.

You can click on the table to add ingredients in your bowl.

If you want to clean the bowl, you can click on the bin :

If you want to start the show, you can click on the lighter :

When you are in the show mode, you can click or press the space bar to launch fireworks.

Julien Duronsoy Game designer - Management
Sam ChevrinSound design Jules PoulainProgrammation Louise Jandot Dit DanjouGame art - Management
